int main()
{
	int t;
	int i,n,pa,pb,smu,clu;
	int val[4]={0,15,30,40};
	
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		pa=0,pb=0,smu=0,clu=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		char s[n+1];
		scanf("%s",s);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='S')
				pa++;
			else
				pb++;
			if(pa==4||pb==4)
			{
				if(pa==4)
					smu++;
				else
					clu++;
				pa=0;
				pb=0;
			}
		}
		printf("%d-%d",smu,clu);
		if(pa!=0 || pb!=0)
		{
			printf(",%d-%d\n",val[pa],val[pb]);
		}
		else
			printf("\n");
			
	}
	return 0;
}
